General.Name: Rosecliff Acquisition Corp I
General.Description: Rosecliff Acquisition Corp I, a blank check company, focuses on effecting a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization/similar business combination with one or more businesses. The company was incoporated in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.
General.Address: 767 5th Avenue 34th Floor, New York, NY, United States, 10153
